core:description.text: An elegant flute of effervescent wine, tiny bubbles rising in persistent streams from the narrow base. The pale straw-gold liquid shimmers with reflected light, and the glass hums faintly with the sound of carbonation.

containers-core:liquid_container.flavorText: Bubbles dance across the tongue with playful effervescence, carrying notes of brioche, citrus zest, and white peach. The wine finishes dry and elegant, leaving a pleasant tingle and an urge to celebrate.
